characters.name: Thor
characters.description: Thor wields a powerful hammer called Mjolnir, and is initially depicted as the arrogant heir to the throne of Asgard whose brash behaviors causes turmoil among the Nine Realms under Asgard's protection. This brings him into conflict with his villainous adopted brother, Loki.

characters.name: IronMan
characters.description: Iron Man is the superhero persona of Anthony Edward Stark, a businessman and engineer who runs the company Stark Industries. He built technologically advanced armor that grants him superhuman strength, flight, energy projection, and other abilities.

characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: Spider-Man gets his superhuman spider-powers and abilities after being bitten by a radioactive spider; these include superhuman strength, agility, reflexes, stamina, durability, coordination, and balance, clinging to surfaces and ceilings like a spider, and detecting danger with his precognition ability called spider-sense.

characters.name: Black Panther
characters.description: Black Panther, also known as T'Challa, is the king of the African nation of Wakanda and possesses enhanced strength, agility, and senses due to consuming the heart-shaped herb. He is a skilled martial artist, strategist, and is adorned with a vibranium suit that grants him durability and energy absorption.

characters.name: Scarlet Witch
characters.description: Scarlet Witch, also known as Wanda Maximoff, is a Marvel Comics character with reality-altering and chaos magic abilities. Originating from the mutant X-Men universe, she has the power to manipulate probability, create energy blasts, and reshape reality, making her a formidable and complex character in the Marvel Universe.

characters.name: Juggernaut
characters.description: Juggernaut, also known as Cain Marko, is a powerful villain in the Marvel Universe. He is a mutant with superhuman strength and invulnerability, thanks to the mystical gem known as the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak. Once in motion, nothing can stop the Juggernaut, making him an unstoppable force and a formidable adversary for superheroes like the X-Men.
